select opinionVerifyFollowModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_opinion_verify_follow opinionVerifyFollowModel left join op_user userModel on opinionVerifyFollowModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where opinionId = ${opinionId}
